title: FlooddamageProcess
abstract: Process to compute the damage of a flood in ecuador.

input.title: duration-h
input.abstract: Tiff file with the duration of the flood in hours

input.title: vsmax-ms
input.abstract: Tiff file with the maximum velocity of the flood in m/s

input.title: wdmax-cm
input.abstract: Tiff file with the maximum water depth of the flood in cm

output.title: damage_manzanas
output.abstract: geojson with the damage of the manzanas

output.title: damage_buildings
output.abstract: geojson with the damage on the buildings
